title: Soy sauce
summary: Soy sauce (also called simply soy in American English[1] and sometimes soya sauce in British English)[2] is a liquid condiment of Chinese origin, traditionally made from a fermented paste of soybeans, roasted grain, brine, and Aspergillus oryzae or Aspergillus sojae molds.[3] It is considered to contain a strong umami flavor.
